title: panniru karattOnE
sahitya:
panniru karattOnE enniru karam kUppi paNIvEn avanarum tuNai tanaip-pera nAn


anupallavi

  innal urum pOdu en idayam adanilE tunbam tOyAdu inbam pAyavE


caraNam    cennaik-kanda kOTTam senranda semmalin ponnaDi pOTruvEn pugazh mAlai sATruvEn
panniru kaNNuDaiyOn bhaktaraik-kaNDadumE tannaruL pAlikkum dayai koNDuDivOn
